title: The Noble Sacrifice of King Shibi

chapters.title: Introduction to King Shibi
chapters.description: King Shibi was renowned for his fairness, compassion, and unwavering commitment to dharma.

chapters.title: The Dove's Plea
chapters.description: A dove, seeking refuge from a pursuing hawk, seeks protection from King Shibi.

chapters.title: The Hawk's Argument
chapters.description: The hawk demands its prey, arguing for its right to survival, putting the king in a moral dilemma.

chapters.title: The Test of Sacrifice
chapters.description: King Shibi offers his own flesh equivalent to the dove's weight to uphold his vow of protection.

chapters.title: The Divine Revelation
chapters.description: The dove and the hawk reveal themselves as gods, testing the king's virtue, and bless him for his nobility.
